title: Sporting leave it late to beat Athletic Club
body_text:
Sporting leave it late to beat Athletic Club
This content isn't available any more.
There was an error
Alisson Santos' 94th minute goal gives Sporting CP a 3-2 win over Athletic Club as the Portuguese champions automatically qualify for the last 16 of the UEFA Champions League.
MATCH REPORT: Champions League - Athletic Club 2-3 Sporting CP
Available to UK users only.
